name: Daedalus Hold
description:
Current state:

This is a pre-alpha version that I showed at Talk & Play #28.

It has 8 levels in one "world" so far. World 2 is currently in development.

Please, Mark Brown, play my game :)

Story:

Daedalus lost his son Icarus, got depressed because all his inventions cause harm to the world and decided to lock himself up in his own underground prison.

In the following weeks, he accepts his own fate and prepares himself for a slow, starving death.

Suddenly, a mysterious shade appears on the ceiling, trying to force Daedalus out of his trap-filled hole using a ray of fiery light.

Gameplay

You have one mission: Get Daedalus out of his grave, whatever it takes.

You have one tool: A ray of fiery light.
